certifications.title: Bootstrap Complete Guide for Frontend Web Development
React-Js Complete Guide for Frontend Web Development
Express-Js Complete Guide for Backend Web Development

projects.name: Letzcreate
projects.description: Build a responsive and dynamic user interface with React.js, creating back-end API with Express.js and Node.js, and store data in a NoSQL database with MongoDB. Implemented responsive and user-friendly frontend interfaces with React.js and Bootstrap, ensuring seamless navigation and optimal user experience.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Build a responsive and dynamic user interface with React.js, create a back-end API with Express.js and Node.js, and store data in a NoSQL database with MongoDB. Developed and implemented seamless payment integration using BrainTree PayPal API. Enabled users to place orders seamlessly while providing admins with tools to manage order statuses efficiently.

projects.name: Portfolio App
projects.description: Developed a dynamic portfolio application using React.js and bootstrap. Implement theme switching based on system preferences or time of day for enhanced user convenience.

projects.name: Restaurant App
projects.description: The restaurant backend, built with Node and Express.js, features user registration, login, and password recovery. Admins can manage food items, and users can view and order food. The system allows users to check their order status. The architecture ensures security and scalability, making it a reliable foundation for a restaurant application.

experiences.description: Developing the Letzcreate from scratch using (MERN Stack and Bootstrap), serving as the backbone of the companys online presence. Employed CSS and Bootstrap for styling, maintaining consistency and aesthetics throughout the website. Implemented Redux for state management, optimizing data flow and improving Website performance.

full_output.name: Yash Kumar Sharma
achievements_and_awards: Achieved mastery of problem-solving techniques through daily practice on multiple online coding platforms like GFG, Hackerrank, Leetcode.
Achieved 5-star rating on Hackerrank, demonstrating proficiency in problem-solving and algorithmic thinking.
Achieved 5-star rating on Hackerrank, demonstrating proficiency in C++ programming language.
